verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Therefore <S%H3651><s%> do my <S%H5587>thoughts<s%> cause me to <S%H7725>answer,<s%> and <S%H5668>for<s%> this I make <S%H2363>haste.<s%>
I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H4148>check<s%> of my <S%H3639>reproach,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of my <S%H4480>understanding<s%> <S%H998><s%> causeth me to <S%H6030>answer.<s%>
Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou not <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5703>old,<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H7760>placed<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%>

That <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H7445>triumphing<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H4480>short,<s%> <S%H7138><s%> and the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of the <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%> but <S%H5704>for<s%> a <S%H7281>moment?<s%>
Though <S%H518><s%> his <S%H7863>excellency<s%> mount <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5060>reach<s%> unto the <S%H5645>clouds;<s%>
Yet he shall <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H5331>forever<s%> like his own <S%H1561>dung:<s%> they which have <S%H7200>seen<s%> him shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H335>Where<s%> is he?
He shall fly <S%H5774>away<s%> as a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4672>found:<s%> yea, he shall be chased <S%H5074>away<s%> as a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eye<s%> also which <S%H7805>saw<s%> him shall see him <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall his <S%H4725>place<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H7789>behold<s%> him.
His <S%H1121>children<s%> shall seek to <S%H7521>please<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> their <S%H202>goods.<s%>
His <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of the sin of his <S%H5934>youth,<s%> which shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
Though <S%H518><s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> be <S%H4985>sweet<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> though he <S%H3582>hide<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue;<s%>
Though he <S%H2550>spare<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it, and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> it <S%H3808>not;<s%> but keep it <S%H4513>still<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> his mouth: <S%H2441><s%>
Yet his <S%H3899>meat<s%> in his <S%H4578>bowels<s%> is <S%H2015>turned,<s%> it is the <S%H4846>gall<s%> of <S%H6620>asps<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him.
He hath swallowed <S%H1104>down<s%> <S%H2428>riches,<s%> and he shall vomit them up <S%H6958>again:<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> shall cast them <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> his <S%H990>belly.<s%>
He shall <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H7219>poison<s%> of <S%H6620>asps:<s%> the <S%H660>viper's<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> him.
He shall <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6390>rivers,<s%> the <S%H5104>floods,<s%> the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1706>honey<s%> and <S%H2529>butter.<s%>

That which he labored <S%H3022>for<s%> shall he <S%H7725>restore,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> swallow it <S%H1104>down:<s%> according to his <S%H2428>substance<s%> shall the <S%H8545>restitution<s%> be, and he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5965>rejoice<s%> therein.

Because <S%H3588><s%> he hath <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> and hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1800>poor;<s%> because he hath violently taken <S%H1497>away<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> which he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%>
Surely <S%H3588><s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>feel<s%> <S%H7961>quietness<s%> in his <S%H990>belly,<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4422>save<s%> of that which he <S%H2530>desired.<s%>
There shall <S%H369>none<s%> of his <S%H400>meat<s%> be <S%H8300>left;<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H5921><s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> man <S%H2342>look<s%> for his <S%H2898>goods.<s%>
In the <S%H4390>fullness<s%> of his <S%H5607>sufficiency<s%> he shall be in <S%H3334>straits:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6001>wicked<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon him.

When <S%H1961>he<s%> is about to <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H990>belly,<s%> God shall <S%H7971>cast<s%> the <S%H2740>fury<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath<s%> upon him, and shall <S%H4305>rain<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> him while he is <S%H3894>eating.<s%>
He shall <S%H1272>flee<s%> from the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H4480>weapon,<s%> <S%H5402><s%> and the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>steel<s%> shall strike him <S%H2498>through.<s%>

It is <S%H8025>drawn,<s%> and cometh <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>body;<s%> <S%H1465><s%> yea, the glittering <S%H1300>sword<s%> <S%H1980>cometh<s%> out of his <S%H4480>gall:<s%> <S%H4846><s%> <S%H367>terrors<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> him.

All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall be <S%H2934>hid<s%> in his secret <S%H6845>places:<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5301>blown<s%> shall <S%H398>consume<s%> him; it shall go <S%H7489>ill<s%> with him that is <S%H8300>left<s%> in his <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall <S%H1540>reveal<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against him.
The <S%H2981>increase<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1540>depart,<s%> and his goods shall flow <S%H5064>away<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath.<s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from <S%H4480>God,<s%> <S%H430><s%> and the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> <S%H561>appointed<s%> unto him by <S%H4480>God.<s%> <S%H410><s%>
